summary: This is an electronic court notification from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding the filing of an 'Acknowledgment and Notice of Appearance' on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell in case 21-58, United States v. Maxwell. It confirms the document was filed and electronically served.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the appellant in the case United States of America v. Maxwell, for whom a notice of appearance was filed.

persons.name: Tammy Torres
persons.context: Her email address (Tammy_Torres@ca2.uscourts.gov) is listed as a recipient for the electronic notice of the court filing.

connections.description: Tammy Torres, as court staff, is a recipient of the electronic notice regarding the legal filing made on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Notice of Appearance Filed for Maxwell
events.description: An 'Acknowledgment and Notice of Appearance' document was filed electronically with the Second Circuit Court of Appeals on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A formal 'Acknowledgment and Notice of Appearance' was filed on April 13, 2021, for Ghislaine Maxwell in her appellate case (21-58) before the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.
The filing was processed electronically via the CM/ECF system, indicating ongoing appellate proceedings in United States v. Maxwell.
Court staff member Tammy Torres was notified of the filing via email as part of the court's electronic service process.
